actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 to permit Federal sharing of the cost of unemployment benefits which extend for 52 weeks.

summary.text: Permits Federal sharing of the cost of unemployment benefits which extend for 52 weeks under the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 to permit Federal sharing of the cost of unemployment benefits which extend for 52 weeks.
